entry.title: $2500 // Quality Crown Heights 3 Bedroom with No Fee
entry.content:
For the most up to date information, visit: https://viewlistings.com/c/posts/2wnr

Unique, modern, beautifully renovated 3-bedroom 1-bathroom apartment located in the Crown Heights neighborhood of Brooklyn. This unit is a prewar building that has been completely restored with attractive, high quality materials and design that will wow your guests.

Amenities Include:
- Modern kitchen with unique design touches
- High quality stainless steel appliances including dishwasher
- Marble countertops
- Gorgeous trendy kitchen counter back-splash
- Solid wood cabinetry
- Stunning bathroom complete with subway tiling, custom vanity featuring oil rubbed bronze faucets and shower head
- Great lighting - recessed bulbs and modern light fixtures throughout unit
- Hardwood oak flooring throughout
- Virtual doorman
- Central air conditioning
- Fitness room
- Laundry room
- Bike room

Conveniently located near the A, C, 3, and 4 Subway lines, providing quick and easy commute around Brooklyn and into Manhattan.

No brokers fee, Just 1st, 1 month security.
Guarantors are welcome
Call, Text or email Izzy to schedule a viewing today.





c9zy588o7nsnf2c
